name: AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
description: Do you like to enjoy music when it is delivered in great quality? Do you need perfect pods for your work? Then don’t wait to grab the Apple AirPods Pro (1st Generation) with MagSafe Charging Case. AirPods Pro are ultra-light, noise-canceling headphones that isolate you from your surroundings so you can concentrate on what you're listening to. To provide improved noise cancellation, they employ two microphones: an outward-facing microphone and an inward-facing microphone. Active Noise Cancellation keeps you fully tuned in to your music, podcasts, and calls by constantly adjusting to the geometry of your ear and the fit of the ear tips. AirPods Pro uses outward- and inward-facing microphones to remove the silicone tips' sound-isolating effect, making things seem and feel more natural, much as when you're chatting to people around you. And, by concentrating your AirPods Pro on the person speaking directly in front of you, Conversation Boost makes it easier to hear individuals during face-to-face talks in loud surroundings.While improving battery life, a high-efficiency high dynamic range amplifier creates clean, extraordinarily clear music. Sound is placed all around you using spatial audio and dynamic head tracking. And, for a rich, consistent listening experience, Adaptive EQ automatically adapts music to suit the shape of your ear. The H1 chip, created by Apple, has a very low audio latency. A force sensor on the stem makes switching between Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode, as well as controlling music and calls, simple. You may have Siri read your messages through your AirPods using Announce Messages with Siri. You and a buddy may play a game, watch a movie, or listen to a song together using Audio Sharing, which allows you to share the same audio stream on two sets of AirPods. To enjoy the true wireless nature of the Bluetooth earphones, and perfect audio quality, the Apple AirPods Pro (1st Generation) with MagSafe Charging Case, is a perfect choice for you. It has a comfortable and flexible design, which is the right fit for any ear. The design in which the earphones are made is stylish, so you can flaunt your earphones with style. They fit the contour of your ear thanks to an inside taper, securing your AirPods Pro, and establishing an outstanding seal for enhanced noise reduction. The MagSafe Charging Case has a battery life of more than 24 hours. Simply place the case on your MagSafe charger or a wireless charging pad when it's time to charge it. When you're not near a wireless charger, you may charge your phone via the Lightning port. So, what are you waiting for? Order the Apple AirPods Pro In-Ear Active Noise Cancellation Truly Wireless Earbuds With Mic, online, now.

name: MacBook Air M1
description: Efficiency Unleashed.Introducing the new Apple MacBook Air 2020 powered by the groundbreaking Apple M1 chip. This update enhances the performance of your apps, brings a fresh design, and incorporates leading-edge privacy features and security.Unified Memory.M1 introduces up to 16GB of lightning-fast unified memory. This shared pool of high-bandwidth, low-latency memory ensures efficient data sharing between the CPU, GPU, and neural engine, enabling rapid and fluid performance.Massive Storage.With up to 2TB of SSD storage, your photos, movies, music, and documents are always at your fingertips.Retina Display.Boasting a stunning 13.3-inch Retina display with a 2560x1600 resolution, this Apple laptop delivers lifelike colours and incredible detail.
